TC-13.2-01.description: Measure response time for generating a full Fortune 500 company profile
TC-13.2-01.expected_result: Total generation time remains within defined SLA for high-complexity entities (e.g., ≤ X seconds).

TC-13.2-02.description: Measure response time for generating a startup company profile
TC-13.2-02.expected_result: Total generation time is significantly lower than large enterprises and within low-complexity SLA.

TC-13.2-03.description: Compare response time between public and private companies of similar size
TC-13.2-03.expected_result: Public company generation time ≥ Private company due to additional disclosures and data volume.

TC-13.2-04.description: Detect performance regression when entity complexity increases
TC-13.2-04.expected_result: Response time scales linearly or sub-linearly; no exponential degradation observed.

TC-13.2-05.description: Validate consistency of response time across repeated runs
TC-13.2-05.expected_result: Response time variance remains within acceptable tolerance (e.g., ±10%).
